name: Definitions
text:
As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires:
     "Grantee" means a party that acquires interest by way of transfer of real property.
     "Record", "recorded", or "recording" means the act of entering into the public records the written instruments affecting title to real property.
     "Signature" means the name of a person as written by the individual or the affixing of a mark or finger or toe print. [L 1995, c 22, §2]
